description:
Impose a warming pattern anomaly to the piSST-control sea surface temperatures (SSTs).  The SST pattern anomaly is derived from years 91-140 of the model's own abrupt4xCO2 experiment, with respect to the piControl, and scaled to have a global mean increase of 4K. The SST pattern anomaly is to be expressed as seasonally varying monthly means.
Same as piSST-control but with a seasonally varying monthly mean pattern of SST warming scaled to 4K.
keywords: CFMIP, Tier 2, SST pattern anomaly, +4K, 4xCO2, AMIP, piControl, SIC
